data.name: Perfect Great Insect
data.desc:
1 Level 8 Insect monster + 1 Level 7 Insect monster
Must first be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by Tributing 1 Insect monster with 2000 or more DEF equipped with an Equip Card. You can only Special Summon "Perfect Great Insect(s)" once per turn. Cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn, during the Battle Phase, if a face-up card is in a Field Zone (Quick Effect): You can destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
